bibl.title: Deliveries for συνήθεια in Byzantine Papyri.
bibl.note: Scrutinizes the papyrological evidence for the formula λόγῳ / ὑπὲρ συνηθείας ("extra" payment) in Byzantine leases.

bibl.title: Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas

bibl.seg: WORP Klaas A., Deliveries for συνήθεια in Byzantine Papyri.
Traianos GAGOS and Roger S. BAGNALL (Edd.), Essays and Texts in Honor of J. David Thomas = American Studies in Papyrology. 42 (Oakville, Connecticut, 2001) pp. 51-68.
Scrutinizes the papyrological evidence for the formula λόγῳ / ὑπὲρ συνηθείας ("extra" payment) in Byzantine leases.
